entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 8:32 PM MDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 8:32 PM MDT Tuesday 11 April 2023
